Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.characters

Class ActiveActor

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.characters.ActiveActor
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActiveActorDestructible
public abstract class ActiveActor extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
Represents an active actor in the game.

An active actor is a movable and graphical element on the game screen. This class extends ImageView and provides fundamental functionalities for positioning, movement, and image loading.

  • Field Details

    • IMAGE_LOCATION

      private static final String IMAGE_LOCATION
      The location of the images folder within the resources.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • ActiveActor

      public ActiveActor(String imageName, int imageHeight, double initialXPos, double initialYPos)
      Constructs an ActiveActor with the specified image and position.

      Initializes the actor with an image, sets its height, and positions it at the specified X and Y coordinates on the game screen.

      Parameters:
      imageName - the name of the image file to use (e.g., "hero.png")
      imageHeight - the height to display the image (in pixels)
      initialXPos - the initial X position of the actor on the screen
      initialYPos - the initial Y position of the actor on the screen

  • Method Details

    • updatePosition

      public abstract void updatePosition()
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to update the actor's position.

      Subclasses will define how the actor's position changes based on game logic, such as movement, collisions, or interactions.

    • moveHorizontally

      protected void moveHorizontally(double horizontalMove)
      Moves the actor horizontally by the specified distance.

      Updates the actor's horizontal position by changing the X-coordinate with the given distance. This movement is relative to the actor's current position.

      Parameters:
      horizontalMove - the distance to move horizontally (in pixels)

    • moveVertically

      protected void moveVertically(double verticalMove)
      Moves the actor vertically by the specified distance.

      Updates the actor's vertical position by changing the Y-coordinate with the provided distance. This movement is relative to the actor's current position.

      Parameters:
      verticalMove - the distance to move vertically (in pixels)

    • loadImage

      private javafx.scene.image.Image loadImage(String imageName)
      Loads an image from the resource path.

      Constructs the path to the specified image within the resources directory and attempts to load it. If the image is not found, it throws an IllegalArgumentException.

      Parameters:
      imageName - the name of the image file (e.g., "enemy.png")
      Returns:
      an Image object representing the loaded image
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the image cannot be found at the specified path
